title: Michael Baratta Research Fund
description: To provide support for research under the direction of Michael Baratta in the Department of Psychology and Neuroscience at CU Boulder.  Support includes travel, equipment, living expense while in Australia, and other research-related expense.
marketingContent: To provide support for research under the direction of Michael Baratta in the Department of Psychology and Neuroscience at CU Boulder. Support includes travel, equipment, living expense while in Australia, and other research-related expense.
